Class Car

  • java.lang.Object
    • Car
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Movable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ferrari, Saab95, Volvo240

    public abstract class Car
extends java.lang.Object
implements Movable
    An abstract class for cars Contains a variables for doors, color, speed, engine power, rotation, and x- and y-position Has methods to create, turn, move, accelerate, brake, and get/set some of the instance variables

      void stopEngine()
      Sets the current speed to 0
